item.title: John Stuart Mill on Free Speech
item.description: Discussion portion of the stream: – Today’s Question To what extent should the government reglate speech? On Liberty, Chapter 2: Of the Liberty of Thought and Discussion John Stuart Mill on Freedom of Speech Famous for his utilitarian ethics Argued that the state should never prohibit an opinion, no matter how false, misleading, or dangerous.
